(2009) | Next album = | Misc = {{Extra album cover | Upper caption = Collector's Edition cover | Type = album | Cover = Young Love Collector's Edition.jpg | Alt = | Border = yes }} {{ Singles | Name = Young Love | Type = studio | single 1 = [[Blow_Your_Mind_(J.Williams_song)|Blow Your Mind]] | single 1 date = 11 August 2008{{cite web|url=http://itunes.apple.com/nz/album/blow-your-mind-single/id287107575|title=Blow Your Mind â Single|work=[[iTunes Store]]|accessdate=26 February 2010}} | single 2 = [[Set It Off (J.Williams song)|Set It Off]] | single 2 date = 27 October 2008{{cite web|url=http://itunes.apple.com/nz/album/set-it-off-single/id293842651|title=Set It Off â Single|work=[[iTunes Store]]|accessdate=26 February 2010}} | single 3 = [[Ghetto Flower]] | single 3 date = 16 March 2009{{cite web|url=http://itunes.apple.com/nz/album/ghetto-flower-single/id307007530|title=Ghetto Flower â Single|work=[[iTunes Store]]|accessdate=26 February 2010}} | single 4 = [[Stand With You]] | single 4 date = 22 June 2009{{cite web|url=http://itunes.apple.com/nz/album/stand-with-you-feat-lavina/id320273989|title=Stand With You (feat. Lavina Williams) â Single|work=[[iTunes Store]]|accessdate=26 February 2010}} | single 5 = [[Your Style]] | single 5 date = 9 November 2009{{cite web|url=http://itunes.apple.com/nz/album/your-style-feat-erakah-single/id338500856|title=Your Style (feat. Erakah) â Single|work=[[iTunes Store]]|accessdate=26 February 2010}} | single 6 = [[You Got Me (J.Williams song)|You Got Me]] | single 6 date = 8 February 2010{{cite web|url=http://itunes.apple.com/nz/album/you-got-me-feat-scribe-single/id352424565|title=You Got Me (feat. Scribe) â Single|work=[[iTunes Store]]|accessdate=26 February 2010}} }}}} '''''Young Love''''' is the debut album by New Zealand [[R&B]] singer [[J.Williams]], released on 13 July 2009 by [[Illegal Musik]]. It was a success, certified Gold by the Recording Industry Association of New Zealand (RIANZ). The album debuted on the [[New Zealand Albums Chart]] at number five,{{cite web|url=http://charts.org.nz/showitem.asp?interpret=J.+Williams&titel=Young+Love&cat=a|title=J.Williams â Young Love (album)|publisher=charts.org.nz|accessdate=26 February 2010}} and has sold over 8000 copies. == Recording and production == Described as an honest and open discourse into the life of Williams,{{Citation needed|date=April 2010}} the album, features guest appearances from fellow New Zealand rappers [[Mareko]] & [[Scribe (rapper)|Scribe]], label mates Temple Jones, [[Erakah]] and D Love, plus a duet with his sister [[Lavina Williams]]. ==Reception== ===Critical reception=== Dane Anderson of [[More FM]] said that on ''Young Love'' "Williams thrives, on the faster, more rhythmic songs...While the slower songs aren't quite up to the par of say [[Usher (entertainer)|Usher]] or [[Ne-Yo]] just yet, you can't deny the catchiness in them."{{cite web|url=http://www.morefm.co.nz/JWilliams---Young-Love/tabid/1510/articleID/8610/Default.aspx |title=J.Williams – Young Love |first=Dane |last=Anderson |publisher=[[More FM]] |archiveurl=http://www.webcitation.org/5rRpimkwR |archivedate=23 July 2010 | accessdate=24 July 2010}} ===Commercial performance=== ''Young Love'' peaked at its debut position of number five on the [[Recording Industry Association of New Zealand|New Zealand Album Chart]] before falling out after eight weeks. It then re-entered the chart after the release of the Collectors Edition, and was certified Gold, selling over 7,500 copies.{{cite web|url=http://www.radioscope.net.nz/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=79&Itemid=61 |title=Latest Gold / Platinum Albums |work=''RadioScope'' |accessdate=24 July 2010}} The album spent a total of twenty-eight weeks in the album chart.{{cite web|url=http://charts.org.nz/showitem.asp?interpret=J.+Williams&titel=Young+Love&cat=a |title=J. Williams – Young Love |work=''Hung Medien'' |publisher=charts.org.nz |accessdate=24 July 2010}} == Singles == * "[[Blow Your Mind (J.Williams song)|Blow Your Mind]]" peaked at number thirteen on the [[Recording Industry Association of New Zealand|RIANZ New Zealand Singles Chart]].{{cite web|url=http://charts.org.nz/showitem.asp?interpret=J.+Williams&titel=Blow+Ya+Mind&cat=s|title=J.Williams â Blow Ya Mind (song)|publisher=charts.org.nz|accessdate=26 February 2010}} * "[[Set It Off (J.Williams song)|Set It Off]]" was released to commercial radio stations in early 2009,{{fact|date=February 2010}} and it charted on the official RIANZ Top 40 singles chart, peaking at number thirty-six.{{cite web|url=http://charts.org.nz/showitem.asp?interpret=J.+Williams&titel=Set+It+Off&cat=s|title=J.Williams â Set It Off (song)|publisher=charts.org.nz|accessdate=26 February 2010}} * "[[Ghetto Flower]]" peaked at number five on the RIANZ chart{{cite web|url=http://charts.org.nz/showitem.asp?interpret=J.+Williams&titel=Ghetto+Flower&cat=s|title=J.Williams â Ghetto Flower (song)|publisher=charts.org.nz|accessdate=26 February 2010}} and was certified gold on 9 June 2009, as it has sold over 7,500 copies in New Zealand.{{cite web |url=http://www.radioscope.net.nz/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=77&Itemid=61 |title=Latest Gold / Platinum Singles|work=[[RadioScope]]|accessdate=29 March 2010}} *"[[Stand With You]]" featured Williams' sister, [[Lavina Williams]]. It peaked at number six{{cite web|url=http://charts.org.nz/showitem.asp?interpret=J.+Williams+feat.+Lavina+Williams&titel=Stand+With+You&cat=s|title=J.Williams feat. Lavina Williams â Stand With You (song)|publisher=charts.org.nz|accessdate=26 February 2010}} and was certified Gold after 10 weeks on the chart. *"[[Your Style]] featured [[Erakah]], and peaked at number sixteen on the New Zealand Singles Chart in its fourth non-consecutive week on that chart.{{cite web|url=http://charts.org.nz/showitem.asp?interpret=J.+Williams+feat.+Erakah&titel=Your+Style&cat=s|title=J.Williams feat. Erakah â Your Style (song)|publisher=charts.org.nz|accessdate=26 February 2010}} *"[[You Got Me (J.Williams song)|You Got Me]]", featuring [[rapping|rapper]] [[Scribe (rapper)|Scribe]], peaked at number one on the RIANZ chart,{{cite web|url=http://charts.org.nz/showitem.asp?interpret=J.+Williams+feat.+Scribe&titel=You+Got+Me&cat=s|title=J.Williams feat. Scribe â You Got Me (song)|publisher=charts.org.nz|accessdate=16 March 2010}} and was certified in its sixth week of charting. ==Track listing== {{tracklist | headline = Standard edition{{cite web|url=http://itunes.apple.com/nz/album/young-love/id321982649|title=Young Love|work=[[iTunes Store]]|accessdate=26 February 2010}}{{cite web|url=http://www.amplifier.co.nz/release/48573/young-love.html?full=1|title=Young Love|work=Amplifier|accessdate=15 March 2010}} | total_length = 51:54 | title1 = Intro | length1 = 0:44 | title2 = [[Ghetto Flower]] | length2 = 3:54 | title3 = [[Set It Off (J.Williams song)|Set It Off]] | length3 = 3:38 | title4 = [[Blow Your Mind (J.Williams song)|Blow Your Mind]] | length4 = 3:48 | title5 = Flavour | length5 = 3:57 | title6 = Solideress | note6 = featuring Temple Jones | length6 = 3:54 | title7 = Vanilla Ladies | note7 = D.
